text: Arthur Whitford (2 July 1908 - 7 January 1996) was a British gymnast. He competed in seven events at the 1928 Summer Olympics.Arthur-Whitford - Gymnastic History ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1996 deaths Category:British male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Great Britain Category:Gymnasts at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Swansea
title: Arthur Whitford
